thread.section_title: Dresslily 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslily 的点评意见 | dresslily.com
thread.title: M Purser
thread.title_full: Dresslily 的点评人 M Purser

author: M Purser
title: M Purser
text: Just like Ezpopsy (and it may be the same company) these guys are scammers. How many things can get lost in the post? I'm sorry but in this world of technology things do not get lost this often nor are they this far from what has been represented. DO NOT BOTHER and if you do, pay through PayPal, then you may have some chance of getting your money back after they have ripped off.
